title: Grindhouse Courthouse #2 - Fist of Legend
content:encoded:
This week the boys discuss whether Fist of Legend (1994), starring Jet Li, is a watchable kung-fu movie.

Dylan controls the courtroom, while Dave takes Defense and squares off against Tom as the Prosecutor. Among the juror is Adam.

title: Grindhouse Courthouse #1 - The 13th Warrior
content:encoded:
The 13th Warrior (1999) starring Antonio Banderas is put on trial as the first movie of the series.

Adam takes lead as the prosecution while Dylan defends this movie in front of the honorable judge, Tom.
